name: tag-cloud
description: A word cloud / tag cloud Power BI custom visual

scripts.sync-api: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=require('./pbiviz.json');const dep=p.dependencies&&p.dependencies['powerbi-visuals-api'];const api=v.apiVersion; if(!dep||!api||dep.replace('^','').replace('~','')!==api){console.error('API mismatch: package.json powerbi-visuals-api vs pbiviz.json apiVersion');process.exit(1)}"
